s: May 2, 2024 - Boscia had an up and down history in retail. In 2004, the brand entered Sephora, and it had an exclusive relationship with the beauty specialty chain that helped it garner attention. Later, Boscia branched out to Ulta and exited Sephora. Recently, Amazon has been a part of its distribution strategy.
